133.sentence: the picture quality is amazing and you can connect it to your tv and could make silent movies that way if you wanted to .

134.sentence: it does have a lense cap , but it wo n't let you take pics with it on which is real good .

135.sentence: the battery recharges ral fast and the recharger thingy that comes with is real nice .

136.sentence: ooh , and i dropped it and it still works fine : this little camera has so many features i have n't even gotten to all of them yet .

137.sentence: it 's easy for beginners to use , but has features that more serious photographers will love , so it 's an excellent camera to grow into .

138.sentence: it 's light weight enough to take with you everywhere , but powerful enough to get outstanding pix .

139.sentence: i love the continuous shot mode , which allows you to take up to 16 pix in rapid succession -- great for action shots .

140.sentence: i 'm amazed at the photo quality -- prints are indistinguishable from 35mm prints .

141.sentence: i only have one complaint , and that is the 8mb card included .

142.sentence: 8mb for a camera like this is a joke .

143.sentence: 1 it has all the features an amatuer photo-enthusiast would want .

144.sentence: 2 it is easy enough for my grandmother to use .

145.sentence: 3 it is very compact but the controls are so well designed that they 're still easy to use .
